Keys.Name: Logging
Keys.Description: How much logging should appear in the Player.log for debugging purposes.

Keys.Name: Enabled
Keys.Description: If enabled, enemy humnanoids will drop corpse items and these items will be required for making minions with.

Keys.Name: Weight in KG
Keys.Description: How much the custom corpse item weighs.

Keys.Name: Enabled2
Keys.Description: If enabled, coffins can be looted.

Sections.Name: Necromancy Effects
Sections.Description: Configure aspects of the necromancy spell effects.

Keys.Name: Skill
Keys.Description: The skill associated with necromancy.

Sections.Name: Necromancer Class
Sections.Description: Custom class added by the mod.

Keys.Name: Enabled
Keys.Description: Adds the Necromancer class to the starting options. Turn off if you're using other class mods. It may conflict.

Keys.Name: Advancement Multiplier
Keys.Description: How quickly, or slowly, the class progresses. Leave at 1.0 for a normal experience.

Keys.Name: HP per Level
Keys.Description: How much HP is gained on level up.
